title: Rights of the child
text:
United Nations 
A/C.3/80/L.63 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
14 November 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-18548 (E)    171125     
*2518548* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Third Committee 
Agenda item 67 
Promotion and protection of the rights of children  
 
 
 
 
 
South Africa: amendment to revised draft resolution A/C.3/80/L.20/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 Rights of the child 
 
 
 
In the thirteenth preambular paragraph, replace “the fourth Global Conference 
on the Sustained Eradication of Child Labour, held in Buenos Aires from 14 to 
16 November 2017” with “the fifth Global Conference on the Elimination of Child 
Labour, held in Durban, South Africa, from 15 to 20 May 2022”.
